mapper.select: SELECT EDJ.NO_SNO ,EDJ.ID ,EDJ.GUBUN ,EDJ.KNAME ,EDJ.ENAME ,EDJ.CNAME ,EDJ.PIC ,EDJ.SEX ,EDJ.BIRTH_YEAR ,EDJ.BIRTH_MONTH ,EDJ.BIRTH_DAY ,EDJ.ADDRESS ,EDJ.ADDRESS_ETC ,EDJ.COUNTRY ,EDJ.COUNTRY_ETC ,EDJ.HP ,EDJ.TEL1 ,EDJ.TEL2 ,EDJ.EMAIL ,EDJ.COMPANY ,EDJ.SPOT ,EDJ.SCHOOL_E ,EDJ.SCHOOL_E_YEAR ,EDJ.SCHOOL_M ,EDJ.SCHOOL_M_YEAR ,EDJ.SCHOOL_H ,EDJ.SCHOOL_H_YEAR ,EDJ.SCHOOL_U ,EDJ.SCHOOL_U_YEAR ,EDJ.SCHOOL_G ,EDJ.SCHOOL_G_YEAR ,EDJ.EDU ,EDJ.ACTIVITY ,EDJ.RELIGION ,EDJ.RELIGION_ETC ,EDJ.CAREER ,EDJ.PSSWD ,EDJ.WDATE ,EDJ.UDATE ,EDJ.ETC1 ,EDJ.ETC2 ,EDJ.ETC3 ,EDJ.ETC4 ,EDJ.ETC5 ,EDJ.ETC6 ,EDJ.ETC7 ,EDJ.ETC8 ,EDJ.ETC9 ,EDJ.ETC10 FROM WJ_EXISTING_DATA_JEJU EDJ WHERE 1=1 AND EDJ.NO_SNO = #{noSno}
SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM WJ_EXISTING_DATA_JEJU EDJ WHERE 1=1 AND FS.TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchKeyword}, '%')

SELECT EDJ.NO_SNO ,EDJ.ID ,EDJ.GUBUN ,EDJ.KNAME ,EDJ.ENAME ,EDJ.CNAME ,EDJ.PIC ,EDJ.SEX ,EDJ.BIRTH_YEAR ,EDJ.BIRTH_MONTH ,EDJ.BIRTH_DAY ,EDJ.ADDRESS ,EDJ.ADDRESS_ETC ,EDJ.COUNTRY ,EDJ.COUNTRY_ETC ,EDJ.HP ,EDJ.TEL1 ,EDJ.TEL2 ,EDJ.EMAIL ,EDJ.COMPANY ,EDJ.SPOT ,EDJ.SCHOOL_E ,EDJ.SCHOOL_E_YEAR ,EDJ.SCHOOL_M ,EDJ.SCHOOL_M_YEAR ,EDJ.SCHOOL_H ,EDJ.SCHOOL_H_YEAR ,EDJ.SCHOOL_U ,EDJ.SCHOOL_U_YEAR ,EDJ.SCHOOL_G ,EDJ.SCHOOL_G_YEAR ,EDJ.EDU ,EDJ.ACTIVITY ,EDJ.RELIGION ,EDJ.RELIGION_ETC ,EDJ.CAREER ,EDJ.PSSWD ,EDJ.WDATE ,EDJ.UDATE ,EDJ.ETC1 ,EDJ.ETC2 ,EDJ.ETC3 ,EDJ.ETC4 ,EDJ.ETC5 ,EDJ.ETC6 ,EDJ.ETC7 ,EDJ.ETC8 ,EDJ.ETC9 ,EDJ.ETC10 FROM WJ_EXISTING_DATA_JEJU EDJ WHERE 1=1 AND EDJ.ID LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchKeyword}, '%')
AND EDJ.KNAME LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchKeyword}, '%')
ORDER BY EDJ.WDATE DESC
